mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.author_hash AS authorHash, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content, c.upvote_count AS upvoteCount, c.downvote_count AS downvoteCount, c.depth AS depth FROM comments c WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.is_deleted = false ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.parent_id IS NULL THEN c.id ELSE c.parent_id END, c.depth, c.created_at

SELECT c.id AS id, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.author_hash AS authorHash, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content, c.upvote_count AS upvoteCount, c.downvote_count AS downvoteCount, c.depth AS depth FROM comments c WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.is_deleted = false ORDER BY (c.upvote_count - c.downvote_count) DESC, c.created_at DESC LIMIT 3
